name: The Wedding Charm
short_description: Celebrate love and unity in a memorable, enchanting ceremony.
long_description: This package includes a luxurious venue with panoramic views, a sumptuous multi-course meal, a premium open bar, and an expert event coordinator to ensure every detail is perfect. Dance the night away with live entertainment in an atmosphere of pure enchantment.

name: Superhero Birthday Party
short_description: Whimsical celebration filled with games, cake, and boundless joy.
long_description: Celebrate your child's special day with an action-packed superhero adventure! Our package includes superhero costumes, themed decorations, exciting games, and a delicious superhero-themed cake. Your child and their friends will have a blast saving the day!

name: Anniversary Celebration
short_description: Honoring years of love, laughter, and cherished memories together.
long_description: Commemorate 50 years of love and companionship with our elegant Golden Anniversary Celebration. This package includes a beautifully decorated venue, live music, a gourmet dinner, and a special toast to the happy couple. It's a night to remember!

name: Enchanted Garden Affair
short_description: A promise of forever, sealed with love, cherished together and shared dreams.
long_description: Step into a fairytale with our Enchanted Garden Affair. This package includes a whimsical garden venue, floral decor, gourmet dining, and a magical atmosphere that sets the stage for a celebration of love and new beginnings.

name: Classic Retirement Gala
short_description: Celebrating a fulfilling career and embarking on new adventures.
long_description: Celebrate a distinguished career with your Classic Retirement Gala. This package includes elegant venue, fine dining, and heartfelt toasts in honor of the retiree. It's a time to reminisce and look forward to new adventures!.

name: Whimsical Baby Wonderland
short_description: A joyous celebration to welcome and bless the upcoming arrival of a precious little one.
long_description: This enchanting event includes a charming venue adorned with baby-themed decor, a delectable spread of treats, fun games, and personalized keepsakes for the parents-to-be. It's a joyful celebration of love and anticipation!.
